General.Name: Bus Online Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhongtian Service Co., Ltd. provides property management and related services in China. It offers residential and commercial property services. The company was formerly known as Bus Online Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Zhongtian Service Co., Ltd. in August 2022. Zhongtian Service Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Jiaxing, China.
General.Address: Building A, Shanshang Building, Jiashan, China, 314100
